name: Failed Adventurer
description:
This game is a beautiful girl + elimination + GALGAME game. In the game, you will play the role of a ghost adventurer who has obtained a devil cube. You will launch a series of revenge actions against all the beautiful girls who have hurt your self-esteem. Finally, you will save the world for your own ambition.ヽ(́◕◞౪◟◕‵)ﾉ
At present, the game is still in the first experience mode, only the content of the third chapter (because only the material of this chapter is finished_(´ཀ`」 ∠)_)
Gameplay
Although it looks similar, this is not a traditional match-3 game.
After clicking the beads, the beads connected to it will be eliminated and the skills will be cast. The more connected beads, the higher the damage!
The clicked bead will increase by one level. When the bead reaches the full level, it will eliminate the same attribute bead in the whole screen and cast the secret skill causing huge damage!
Pay attention to the layout of the beads, properly eliminate and upgrade the beads is the key to pass the game and control the battle!
It is expected that the full version of the game plot will have three beautiful girls who can be attacked-the paladin, the magician, and the female devil.
